FuncDef: This command dumps multi-chassis sync database information.

ParaDef.Info: Dumps the specified address of the multi-chassis peer.
Dumps the specified port ID of the multi-chassis peer.
Dumps the specified Link Aggregation Group (LAG) on this system.
Dumps the synchronization tag used while synchronizing this port with the multi-chassis peer.
Dumps the specified application information that was synchronized with the multi-chassis peer. Values-dhcps, igmp, igmp-snooping, mc-ring, srrp, sub-mgmt, mld-snooping, all.
Filters by the specified entry type. Values-alarm-deleted, local-deleted.
